document_data.caption: A map of Old Delzoun, ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.name: Old Delzoun
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Delzoun''' was one of the three main regions of the [[Silver Marches]], encompassing the lands that were once the [[Dwarf|dwarven]] realm of [[Delzoun]].
document_data.History: The cities of Old Delzoun became a part of the [[League of the Silver Marches]] in [[1371 DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Many ruins in Old Delzoun contained lost [[portal]]s to the [[Underdark]]. Underdark denizens sometimes used these portals during surface raids.
document_data.Notable Locations:
The heart of Old Delzoun was within Sundabar Vale, the center of which contained the great fortress city of [[Sundabar]]. The lands surrounding Sundabar are the most populous area of the Marches. 

At the western edge of Sundabar Vale, the village of [[Auvandell]] sat near [[Silverymoon Pass]].

The Fork was the place where the [[Fork Road]] met the [[Adbar Road]] and served as the divider between the Adbar Run and Sundabar valleys. A dwarven ruin and [[Wildlands Rest|an inn]] were here.

A band of [[Uthgardt]] from the [[Sky Pony Tribe]] resided at [[Wolmad's Camp]], located in the west of Old Delzoun on the northern slopes of the Nether Mountains.
